The width of the rectToDraw.
The gross depth of the rectToDraw.
The effective span length of the rectToDraw section.
The span type of the rectToDraw being designed.
The design moment for which the section is going to be designed for.
Condition if the rectToDraw is to be designed as doubly reinforced or not.
